Dialogue: Give Orin the fish, he needs it more than you do.
Let her die. She's earned her rest
Let Korel go, he's learned his lesson.
Lie to him. Give him comfort at the end.
Confront Kay's lies, show her the corpses.
Keep the fish, you need your strength
Keep her awake. She has to fight for life.
Kill Korel, prevent him from harming again.
Tell him the truth. He must understand their brutality.
